creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: three full lines and one partial line of bold text; two short lines of smaller text below partial line of text at left edge; two square red seals, LLQ
text: Who took water from the Eastern Sea, And washed this lovely lotus so clean' The mountain bestrides three provinces, A mound of eight petals piercing the skies. Clouds and mist ring the great foothills like steam; The sun and moon shun her central peak. Alone she stands, ever without peer, The grandest mountain of them all!
title: Mount Fuji
